name: taiko
description: An easy to use wrapper over Google Chrome's Puppeteer library.

scripts.format: js-beautify *.js lib/*.js test/*.js -r -b collapse,preserve-inline && npm run lint
scripts.doc: ./node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js build taiko.js -f md -o docs/index.md --markdown-toc=false && ./node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js build taiko.js -f json -o docs/api.json && node docs/setup.js

author: getgauge
